attributes.action: Put up the names of any MP who has direct financial links with any of the organisations who had anything to do with the sell off of Royal Mail.
attributes.additional_details: It is simply not believable that so much can be wrong with our government that ABSOLUTELY EVERYTHING it touches goes so horribly wrong.  There must be members of our political elite who are exercising their acquisition of personal wealth to extreme lengths, intending to cause damage to the country and our society.  THERE MUST BE MPs WITH LINKS TO THESE ORGANISATIONS, WHO ARE MAKING A FORTUNE OUT OF THESE FAILURES.  The public MUST be made aware of who they are.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Houses' of Parliament and not the Government.  However the information tnat you are seeking is publically available on the Members register of Interest.
